column5: [font color=green size=3][b]1 new fire in the Kenora district and 4 in the Souix Lookout distict on June 15th. It's shaping up to be a dry summer, water levels in a lot of remote lakes are falling. If rain doesn't come soon they'll be shutting down the logging operations in the bush. Wish'in I was fish'in on Wabby
